rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance with minimalistic design incorporating clean lines and neutral colors.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open living space with a focus on natural light from the garden view. Incorporates smart home features and minimalist furniture.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Secluded dining area adjacent to the living room, designed for social gatherings.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern, fully-equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances, minimalist cabinetry, and efficient layout promoting smooth workflow. Incorporates Vastu principles by placing the sink in the northeast corner.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom oriented towards the garden. Incorporates en-suite bathroom with ample natural light and peaceful ambiance, ensuring optimal Vastu orientation.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Functional guest room designed for comfort with a minimalist aesthetic and easy access to amenities.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Dedicated home theater space featuring state-of-the-art acoustics, LED lighting, and soundproofing, located in the west portion of the house to complement the West-facing plot and Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Utility Room/Storage
rooms.description: Integrated storage area for utilities and daily essentials, designed with modular storage solutions.

openings.description: Large windows providing ample natural light while maintaining privacy. East facing windows to harness morning sunlight.
Minimalist door design in neutral tone ensuring seamless transition from the outdoor garden into the indoor space.
Soundproof windows to prevent external noise and maintain acoustics.

garden.description: Expansive garden with landscaped design, water feature for tranquility, native plant species, and designated areas for relaxation.
